item.description:
• Join us as we continue our tour of North End restaurants. This month, we will be visiting Davide. This restaurant has good food. Please note that the restaurant will have a smaller menu available for us so that they can more easily accommodate our large group. There will still be a nice range of menu choices and all dietary needs will be met.

  • After dinner, we will be head to the Living Room lounge for drinks. Each member pays for their own food/drink. We look forward to seeing you for a fun night!

    RSVP Note. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend, as this will be a popular event and space is very limited at this restaurant.Â  Please do not sign up just to hold your spot without knowing if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, please be sure to update your RSVP- please do not wait until Saturday to change your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) at our tables or call 774 232 0000
item.name: Monthly North End Dinner and Drinks Series: Davide Restaurant
